name: Zhu Zhengting (Theo Zhu)
description: '''Zhu Zhengting''' ({{zh|s=朱正廷}}, born March 18, 1996) is a Chinese singer and actor. He debuted as a member of limited boy band [[Nine Percent]] in 2018 through the Chinese talent show ''[[Idol Producer]]''. He is currently the leader and main dancer of [[Yuehua Entertainment|Yuehua's]] [[NEXT (Chinese band)|NEXT]].
